Remove an Agent from Team

DELETE

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

teams

/

{team\_id}

/

team\_members

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/teams/{team_id}/team_members \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "user_ids": [\
    123\
  ]
}'
```

200

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/remove-an-agent-from-team#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/remove-an-agent-from-team#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/remove-an-agent-from-team#parameter-team-id)

team\_id

integer

required

The ID of the team to be updated

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/remove-an-agent-from-team#body-user-ids)

user\_ids

integer\[\]

required

IDs of users to be deleted from the team

#### Response

200

200403404422

Success
